messages.message:
Hi Team,
When I accidentally try to upload a file in the field section view (on the right side of the document view), the "*Drop files to upload*" button becomes disabled, and the :heavy_plus_sign: icon for uploading files is also inactive. However, if I refresh the page or upload the file in the document view instead, the upload works as expected.
Iâ€™m attaching a screen recording for your reference. Is this the intended behavior?

cc : @Nithin

yeah the page shouldn't continue showing the purple overlay with the "Drop files to upload" message

i think this is pretty low-priority to fix, so i'll create an AUTO ticket to track, not an EPD ticket

fyi @Kaustubh (KD)
Yeah we can create a bug here I think this is low priority as well
